turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like for you to order me a Cafe Mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There's a Starbucks on Pinhook in Lafayette.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good could what size would you pefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get the Venti Cafe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Don't you realize that the Venti Cafe Mocha is almost 500 calories?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes i sure do, I don't have many of them for that reason, they are so good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If that is what you desire.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Atleast it has 17 grams of protein in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah well thats basically not saying much.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have you ever been to the Starbucks on Pinhook?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No I sure haven't.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well just to give you a heads up be very careful over there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you mean?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It gets crazy over there as far as the drive thru, the parking lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What exactly do you mean?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One time I was in the drive thru, a lady not only cut the line but hit the back of my vehicle trying to cut the line.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you serious?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes I sure am, how upsetting right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very what did you do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I got out my vehicle and asked her to back up and stay off my vehicle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You didn't call the cops?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I didn't, she actually just tapped it and nothing happen to the vehicle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Boy, was she lucky.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah she probably could give a damn but she was lucky,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very impressive how you handled that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wish I could get a ratio of how many people would of still kept their sanity.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So i guess the parking lot is the better option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah i would just park there just in case.
